channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Deep pothole, 20th June
item.description:
Mid-carriageway on sandford mill road c.10/15m from Southgate road egress deep pothole.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): London Road, Charlton Kings, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Potholes between ingress to Woodgate close and nearby pedestrian island, 20th June
item.description:
Westbound carriageway between ingress to Woodgate close and ingress to east end road several potholes.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): London Road, Charlton Kings, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bad flooding on new cycle path, 20th June
item.description:
There is large and deep flooding on the new cycle path on the B4063 opposite Briarfields Park. Almost impassable by bike and terrible for pedestrians. Whole section needs a drain installing or relaying.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Gloucester Road, Golden Valley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Road in bits, 19th June
item.description:
I have to use this road regularly and it is in a real state. The holes are shocking. Please can they get fixed. Thanks
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hartley Lane, Shurdington, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Reopened potholes, 19th June
item.description:
Potholes were fixed a couple of months ago. Opened again.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 10, Pilley Lane, Leckhampton, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Several potholes, 19th June
item.description:
Road has several potholes in it. It's too narrow to try to avoid them.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 5, Norwood Road, Tivoli, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Road in very poor condition, 19th June
item.description:
Numerous potholes. Road in a real state and had to swerve around them. Please can this be fixed.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 31, Queen's Road, Lansdown, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Road mirror very dirty, 19th June
item.description:
Not sure who would be responsible for this but the traffic mirror to aid driver viewing is dirty and makes it very difficult to see. Had a near miss the other evening as I couldn't see who was coming from the other directions. Would be grateful if it could be cleaned please. Thanks.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Leckhampton Hill, Shurdington, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Way through hedge overgrown, 19th June
item.description:
Brambles have overgrown the passage through from Campden Road to the A40. This happens about this time each year. Please could you arrange for them to be cut back? Many thanks.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 16, Campden Road, St Mark's, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Footpath off Salisbury Avenue is overgrown and impassable, 19th June
item.description:
The footpath from Salisbury Avenue to Lichfield Drive is overgrown with weeds and impassable due to stinging nettles. Three residents have raised this matter with me.

Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Faulty road surface, 18th June
item.description:
Faulty road surface due to heavy traffic that has damaged and lowered considerably the road level leaving standing water and debris which in turn is causing damage to my vehicles when other vehicles drive through it at any speed above a crawl. Buses , lorries and agricultural vehicles driving on the path have damaged the kirbstones also.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 54, Dark Lane, Kingsditch, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dumped car wheels, 18th June
item.description:
Dumped car wheels (tyres & rims complete) and other car parts, in corner of Albemarle car park.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 2, Albemarle Gate, Pittville, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Abandoned vehicle, 18th June
item.description:
Although taxed, this vehicle hasn't moved for at least 2 months.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 6b, Colletts Drive, St Peter's, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Grass to long, 17th June
item.description:
Grass is to long around roundabout,danger to drivers not have clear view off on coming traffic.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Elmbridge Court Roundabout, Elmbridge, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Garden Fire, 16th June
item.description:
Neighbour has been burning things in the garden for 3 days. Cant hang washing out, cant open windows during cooler hours. Constant smell well into the night.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, Hayden Road, Arle, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Abandoned road sign, 15th June
item.description:
Road sign and barriers been in place several weeks but no sign of ongoing work. Looks to be forgotten. Causing a pinch point in the road. Due to the curve of the road I have witnessed several near misses where south bound traffic moves to the middle of the road to avoid the sign and comes to conflict with north bound traffic
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Kayte Lane, Bishop's Cleeve
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Brambles overhanging lane, 15th June
item.description:
Gravel walk is once again a hazard to pedestrians and motorists as brambles and nettles have been allowed to get out of hand once again. Residents at the lower end of the lane leading out onto Southam Lane have allowed their boundaries to become overgrown.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Gravel Walk, Southam, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Street cleaning and fly tipping, 15th June
item.description:
Street need cleaning and there broken glass and fly tipping of fridge freezer and matel there too
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 14, Avon Road, Whaddon, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Avon road, 15th June
item.description:
Fridge freezer dump and mantel dump too and glass on the paths and needs litter picking
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 19, Avon Road, Whaddon, Cheltenham

item.title: Churn avenue, 15th June
item.description:
It needs litter pick rubbish on the path
